review_text: Great experience so far

Phone randomly shuts off throughout the day with a charged battery. When this happens, the only way to turn the phone back on is to connect it to a charger. A few minutes later, the phone shuts itself off again, and the cycle continues. The phone is pretty much stock, no new apps. I paid a lot of money for this "Certified Refurbished" phone, and it did not deliver. Very flawed.

We purchased this for my wife after her phone was stolen.  This never worked quite right; the sound was always bad and it did not seem to have the storage it should.  Somehow the phone got locked and would not unlock. She took it to Apple.  They said it was a throw away model that they used in stores as demos and then tossed. They said the sound was set that way deliberately and that the phone should never have been sold.  Be warned.
Had a very smal scratch on the upper corner. But all in all was in great condition and well worth the purchase!
My phone arrived in very good condition. I popped my sim card in and updated ios and I'm a happy camper.

received the phone quite quickly.. looked like it was in good shape.. no scratches.. I'm writing this review 7 months after receiving the phone. For the most part, I'm pleased with it.. but 6 months after getting it (this past December), I couldn't keep a charge in it...and when I plugged it into the charger that came with the phone, it wouldn't charge at all.. I took it to a phone repair shop.. the battery was dead and the port was bad and had to be replaced.. And the charging cord was bad. I'm surprised that after only 6 months that the battery and port went bad.  So I don't know if they didn't check those two things when you recondition a phone, isn't putting a new battery in part of the reconditioning? As well as making sure the port is in good shape?  I only use my phone for talking and texting, so I'm not hard on it at all. and why wouldn't they give a new charging cord with the phone. They don't cost that much.. This is why I couldn't give them five stars.. It cost $102.00 to get everything fixed

Love the phone, it's big lol . I'm just loving the fact that everything is working so far , came in good condition. Also if you feel like the phone won't charge, or when you put the charger in and it doesn't charge? Try the charge that it came with . & the charge that came with the phone ? May stop working . Because it's not an apple product , so you may have to use to buy an apple charger which isn't expensive

I only got the phone 2 days ago for my daughter.  So if I don't update anything, everything is very good.  The phone was in new condition, not a scratch.  The charger is fine and the phone battery was at 90% on delivery.  We are very happy with the initial experience of this like new phone 6s Plus.  We got my son the Iphone 6s last year (refurbished), and it is still in excellent condition.  That's why we had no doubt about buying another phone.  Delivery was on time.

Like many I was skeptical on buying a refurb sight un-seen. This phone arrived the next day and was in great shape. The screen was scratch free except for 1 tiny 1/16th mark which I can't even see now when I put the glass screen protector on it. The whole thing works well and I'd order another one if the need arises.

I ordered 2 phones and I was pretty scare that it was going to be a bad deal but it turned out to be a good deal. the phones look new no visible scratches  shipping was a lot much faster than the expected date. so far I was able to connect my carrier with the phone and set it up, its working pretty good right now, we'll see how it keeps on working in the future

Unbelievable!!!! I did NOT receive a "Refurbished" product. This was 100% USED. There's a difference. You can tell they paid no attention to the condition of this phone neither operationally or aesthetically. Deep gouged scratches in the screen, defective vibration performance, and the very poor battery health. Once it hits 50% battery it shoots to 1% and then dies. Nothing about this phone was actually refurbished, I might as well have just chanced Craigslist for half the price.
The phone wouldn't get service and I tried with multiple sims that worked on other phones, wouldn't recommend just buy new

The phone I received was in great physical condition but the touchscreen completely did not work on it.  Had to return and buy elsewhere locally due to time sensitivity.  Things like this need to be quality checked on a "refurbished" device.
Came with scratches around the camera, doesn't seem to be "refurbished" as well as I had hoped.

I received the phone earlier than expected and I could not be happier with the purchase I made. The phone looks absolutely brand new and I could not see any signs of wear or tear. I am beyond satisfied with the purchase!
It is refurbished so I was scepical , but had it 6 months and everything is perfect.

The phone is refurbished but internal issues do not seem to have been fixed. Sure, it works, but with all the stress you’ll go through from calls being dropped, being backed out of apps, randomly shutting down, etc. it’s definitely best to go to your service provider. I think having someone to hold accountable for the defects and someone who will actually work with you to fix those is better. SAVE YOUR MONEY!

I am pleased with the phone. There were a few marks on it and the screen, but I knew when you buy a refurbished phone you take that chance. It was able to be used with Ting and that was my major priority.
Battery issues from the start. Phone will show 40% battery life then shut down suddenly showing 0 battery life and needing to be charged. Otherwise no issues with phone after 4 months.

I bought the phone and the speaker decibels were half of my sons 6s. I can barely hear people talk with any back ground noise. I was going to send it back but never did because I would be without of phone for a week or so,
Works very well.  First time user of iphone.  Model recommended by a retired engineer. Meets our expectations.  Using with T-Mobile network.

Okay so I bought a rose gold one and it crapped out on me so they refunded me and I bought this and so far so good!  Looks amazing. And so far it's working good! I'm updating it as we speak and no scratches or anything!

Very disappointed in this item. Camera on both sides don’t work, Apple Pay doesn’t work finger print doesn’t work. Not sure if the package just wasn’t handled with care but are some cosmetic cracks on screen sending product back unfortunately

I brought this refurbished iphone 6s plus six months back and just today, after charging the phone overnight the phone stopped working. CPR shop said that the is reason due to overnight charging the phone recharge port got shorted and this also blew the lcd sensor and lcd itself. Sucks that I have to go through this after spending $449
Ordered the phone and it was in mint condition and worked perfectly. The 1 defect it did have was you couldnt hear incoming calls. Returned it and ordered another, hope its better this time!
Just as i expected, the phone works perfectly, I would buy from this seller again. Very satisfied
It came a few days earlier and works great. It didn't come with earbuds or the apple box. I've had it for 5 months and it works great
The product is said to be Certified Refurbished but came with a problem on the headphone jack. The sound is weird through it, with some sort of bad-contact.
The charging port is not working the standard is not good poor quality
Charger is very very ordinary one but cell phone is fine. I brought a good charger.
The phone looked great except it was locked to AT&T. Tried to get unlocked on AT&T's website and it said the phone still had outstanding payments and can not be unlocked.

I had my phone right away in the first day around holidays less than 7 days I was very pleased with my purchase. I read the reviews and kept fearing the most, but my phone works 100% like I would have bought from a Apple store. Just didn’t come with headphones which doesn’t bother me which didn’t say in details or description.
This product was freezing shortly after received. It completely died within two months of the purchase and it is to return.
The only issue I’ve had is that this one doesn’t have enough memory
Generic box, No ear Phones, Looks great no Scratches, working great for 1 month now
The phone is in good condition physically, but the ear speaker doesn’t work. Phone has to be used on speaker phone when talking or else you can’t hear anything... it’s rather inconveniencing.
Thumb print to open apps is great. One button to view emails is terrible. Steep learning curve. Whatever happened to operating manuals?
After 3 month it started to doesn't charge. Before ıts performance wasn't good also. I'm really disappointed.

The phone is huge first off. A total difference from my 6s. When it arrived and I took it out the box it looked brand freakin new. It even came with an apple branded charging brick, and it delivered on the expected delivery date!!! I’m so happy I got my new phone!!! If you ever need to buy a new phone, You know who to trust!
Had this phone for about a month and works fine so far- But the screen came with some scratches even though it was a ‘new certified refurbished’
The phone did not work it had no entena. But I got a refund 👍🏻
The phone looks brand new with no scratches I transferred from my Apple 5 sim card to the six plus with ease So far so good with Kanga
They really care about everything. The phone is perfect but the charger broken with one week. They gave me a discount because I couldn't receive this on time. Thanks!
I got the 16 gb version even though it was listed as a 64 gb version. Phone looks brand new though
Got our daughter this for Christmas and have had so many issues with it, long story short, it is getting sent back. Didn't even wanna give it 1 star.
Great phone and came very early. Thanks!
Great phone. Worked really well. It looked brand new when I took it out of the box. I used the phone on straight talk and never had a problem with it.

The product sold to me by MyWit is an absolute joke. It says certified refurbished when the charger port isn't even compatible nor does it work. I was ready for scratches and things and such but you can't even turn the phone on. I would like a full refund
Looks like new I love this phone. Big phone for small hands.
Very happy with this phone.
I've had some issues with the phone being refurbished and all but it will work for now.
Super fast shipping and great phone so far! Was a bit skeptical about buying on here but phone is in perfect condition and was easy to set up with my T-Mobile sim.
Ordered 2 last week arrived in perfect condition

Before I ordered this phone, i was worried sbout the conditions of the phone n accessories for the phone. However, i ordered it and i am really realy please with this phones condition n functionality.
I ordered a iPhone 6s Plus with 64gb storage and got one with 16gb storage instead. Didn't even realize till it started telling me that my storage is full.
The delivery, this phone according with my expectations... high recommend
purchased this phone for my grandaughter.  she is completely satisfied. thanks amazon.
I’ve had my refurbished phone for a few months now and it still runs perfect, great buy! I will never buy a new phone again!

I love this phone its very great and  I will buy again. I did chose a 16gb but they sent me a 32gb which was very generous of them, and the phone came with a glass screen  installed already and the phone didn't have any visible damage which was a huge plus.

Phone is in excellent shape. Put in T-Mobile prepaid sim works with no issues. Used the phone for a couple hours (iPhone 6s plus) no issues. However when I did the iOS 11.2.6 update after an hr phone randomly crashes has a glitchy screen like someone broke an lcd tv. So I don’t know if it’s the update or the phone otherwise it works well.

I got my phone days before it stayed it would and I was pleased. The phone had no scratches and no dents or scuffs. The battery was draining very fastly but that was expected with a phone this old. I had the phone checked out and it had never been opened inside. This is the best deal!  (Got it from MyWit)
great product.

Suddenly my phone just touch the ice cream that I had and then I clean right away but then the speaker was gone from loudspeakers to small how can I fix it?

I received this phone in good condition with a minor scuff on the bottom. Battery life wasn’t great, but I replaced it with apple’s $29 battery replacement program. Otherwise I would rate this phone a 4.5/5

I ordered this phone not knowing what to expect but I absolutely loved. The phone itself is like new with only a minor scuff on the back that you can't even notice with a case on. It arrived with a charger and everything worked fine. I would consider buying another phone from here in the future.

My husbands phone was stolen last week which is what prompted us to by this phone. We ordered it Friday and it arrive Wednesday through Amazon Prime... The phone looked great but once we got it activated with Verizon we realized the speakers were messed up when you play music, watch videos, your alarm goes off, or the phone rings. The sound is extremely distorted, hard to hear, and understand specially when having to talk on speak phone. Upset that the phone arrived like that. I know it’s refurbished but that should have been checked. After all we went through with having our original phone stolen it was just more added stress to receive a replacement with busted speakers.

Everything worked as promised, Little bit of scratches on the back but 100% functional, camera 10/10 , screen 9/10 , battery 10/10 ,It came on a envelope from local mail but with not problem at all , looking forward for an ipad of this guys !!! - Vius - , thanks again !

Just got my phone in the mail yesterday. I have not one complaint so far. The phone is excellent condition. Works great and was super easy to set up. Package was delivered promptly and came within the time frame I was given. Currently writing this review on the purchased device. If necessary I would definitely purchase again!! Thanks Amazon!!
Amazing!!! My iPhone came with absolutely no scratches and no damages it looks brand new it also came with the charger and headphones. Worth the $430

Came in a box with little protection for the phone. The phone also displayed poor battery life early on in my ownership and had a few scratches on the screen. However, it beats the monthly phone payment plan provided by the company. So I do not regret my purchase.
